channel.title: Armor ===> plz help <===
channel.description:
how do i change the armor of players that spawn for the first time??![br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2007, 12:37:17 PM[/size][hr]y does nobody help me!!!!!!??????
=[

item.title: Armor ===> plz help <===
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

open player.java and search for something like this

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;
now just tÂµchange the -1 to the id you want your players to wield
